content: the right front to neck shaping pick up and k 27 30 33 sts along the neck shaping to sts on holder k 47 47 51 sts from holder pick up and k 27 30 33 sts along the left neck shaping pick up and k 33 36 45 sts along the left front to co edge 167 179 207 sts work in beaded rib worked flat for 4 row starting with a ws row buttonhole row for a boy ws *pattern 5 5 7 sts bobble 2 sts repeat from * 4 times more pattern to end of row buttonhole row for a girl ws pattern to last 35 35 45 sts *bobble 2 sts pattern 5 5 7 sts repeat from * 4 times more on next row co 2 sts over each bobble section from previous row k3 more row in pattern st and then bobble all sts in k on next row sew 5 buttons onto the front sew the underarm seam weave in all ends ©2014 plymouth yarn company 091514vle designed by vanessa ewing 081816jbt abbreviations beg= begin ning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue dpns= double pointed needles increase= increase m= marker patt= pattern pm= place marker p = purl rem= remain ning repeat= repeat round=round rs= right side sl = slip ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through the back loop st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st decrease = together ws= wrong side
